name: Talking Necromatic Tree
description: An ancient tree corrupted by dark magic, its branches whisper with malevolent intent.

abilities.name: Healing Roots
abilities.description: The tree extends its roots to heal an ally, restoring 800 HP with natural magic.

abilities.name: Hollowing Scream
abilities.description: The tree emits a terrifying scream that removes a buff from all enemies.

passive.name: Forest Corruption
passive.description: The tree's presence corrupts the forest around it, gaining mana regeneration when allies are nearby.
